website_summaries.verdict: This value-packed set of 3 wet-dry bags delivers surprisingly good performance for the price and the solid colors make them fantastically versatile.
pros: Sealed waterproof TPU lining does a great job of preventing leaks
Dry pockets provide extra storage space for clean items
Understated design can easily double as an on-the-go solution for gym clothes, wet bathing suits, or towels
Set of 3 can be rotated on laundry day
cons: The actual colors don’t quite match the pictures

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, durable, easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: We initially used these for our trip to Iceland and our visit to the Blue Lagoon. We didn’t want our silica-covered bathing suits damaging our other clothes and these bad did the trick! Now that we’re back from our trip, they’ll go in my baby’s diaper bag... excellent, excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic0418

customer_reviews.title: Better than name brand!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Compared to my Alva brand wet bags these are about the same, honestly they feel stronger more durable than my Alva brand wet bags I definitely recommend these to those who cloth diaper even for wet swim clothing I use these at the water park
customer_reviews.author: Mr.&Mrs. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these to organize the diaper bag. One for snacks, one for diapers/extra outfit, and one for toys and books! I actually have a 4th one as well I use for wet things at the zoo or splash park. If you wring out clothes real well you don’t have issues but a sopping wet bathing suit forget it... so far when pouches or snacks have spilled in the bag it hasn’t leaked and I threw it in the washer but hung dry it.
customer_reviews.author: Kms

customer_reviews.title: I think this is lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to bought this, so my kids have one each in their backpack in case their clothes are dirty so can go in dirty/travel laundry bag from summer school. I also using for summer activities whenever is dirty, wet, etc. It's save the plastic/grocery bag, we need more world to take care of this planet so we don't get waste the plastic/groceries bag all the times, especially the ocean. I'm happy to have those bags because I think it is life saver and can use washable and reusable, where you can use for longtime. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Danika

customer_reviews.title: When there was school :)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this so the kids could put their dirty clothes when they changed after school. Worked out fabulously. Previously I tried various bags, that they would place in their backpacks and it would leave their backpacks smelling like dirty clothes. With these bags, no more dirty clothes smell in their backpacks. It holds moisture well, but not wet items like swim clothes, the may leak. If rung dry before placing in the bag you should have no issues. The bags were washed every weekend and held up well. It was used quite a bit before physical school ended. Mom approved.
customer_reviews.author: Cesyanae

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 zippers broke.
customer_reviews.text: We had similar wet bags and they were great for my kids to take their swim suits back and forth from camp, but after a number of YEARS one of the zippers broke. I ordered these on July 13 and they arrived on July 15th. Two and a half weeks later, the zipper broke on the first (white) one we were using. I pulled out the grey one to replace it, but a week and a half after that the zipper broke on that one too!!!! Really disappointed. I got 3+ years out of the previous ones I bought (one still going strong), but though these looked similar they clearly aren't made as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The bags work really well for holding things, just not water. When putting wet clothes/diapers in the bag, the bag gets soaked. No matter the amount of water (I wring out my clothes), the bag always seemed to stay wet.
customer_reviews.author: Harlequintet

customer_reviews.title: You NEED these
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for everything from pump parts to swimsuits. I buy them for every new mom I know. I used these mostly for carrying pump parts to and from work. I love that you can just put them in the washer! I don't put them in the dryer because I don't want anything to melt. But if you hang them on a door handle after you wash them they will be dry in like 30 minutes. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Holloway

customer_reviews.title: perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bags for a 3 day fitness conference. I had several sets of clothing and needed to be able to sort dry and wet clothing between classes. I loved that I could have my next change of clothing ready and sorted and just replace with the dirty or wet clothing quicky. Perfect size for complete fitness/ swim outfits. Kept dry -dry and wet away from dry... Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JAVACIZE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sweaty yoga clothes
customer_reviews.text: These wet bags are super handy. I purchased for putting my sweaty workout clothes into after yoga. I put the clothes into the wet bag and throw the wet bag into my yoga bag. Then when I get home the dirty clothes and wet bag go into the laundry. Getting 3 in the pack is perfect and I always have a clean bag. The bags have washed and dried with no issue. Bags are high quality and the perfect solution! Would highly recommend. I imagine you could find many uses for these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: Handy bags for just about anything.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Just what I expected from pictures/description. Got these for mama cloth- there are now 3 women in my household so these are perfect for all that. I did cloth diaper years ago and these would have been so much better than the bags I had for that. I plan to get another pack of these soon for swim suits. Wish there were mini versions half the size for a purse version for mama cloth and/or new mama breast pads...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Filograsso

customer_reviews.title: Leak very quickly
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use for the pool and also for potty training. For the potty training, we packed a spare change of clothes and if the child had an accident we just switched them out. These bags worked perfectly for that since it's not like any of the pants were sopping wet. However, when you put drenched bathing suits in the bag it definitely leaks out of the corners. We only use it in a pool bag so it's not a huge issue, but I'm still fairly annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: CPFisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wet bathing suits and shoes
customer_reviews.text: I take these to the gym and put my put my wet bathing suit in after swimming. Keeps the rest of my gym bag dry. I also use one for shoes when I travel so I do not contaminate everything in my luggage. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cdk

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for dirty diapers and spit up clothes and they have done what they promised - keeps wet stuff inside and away from your dry stuff. I like that it has a separate zipper area as well for dry stuff. The quality and size are nice / enough room for lots of stuff. I highly recommend these bags for wet stuff, diapers, spit up cloths, etc! The colors were fun also - easy to find in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: LBF

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, leaks at seams
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bags, but not sealed enough to hold drippy cloth diapers until wash day. The seams aren't sealed and so there is seepage, we now put the bag in the sink, so it wont leak. The plan initially was to hang it from the changing table. They are very pretty and clean easily on the machine and would probably be fine for a bathing suit and towel on the way home from swimming, but not for a day or 2 until washday
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping smells in
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put any wet products in these, so I'm not 100% sure of the water resistance... However, they do great at keeping the smell of stinky cloth diapers in! Also great whenever baby has an accident and you need somewhere to put his dirty clothes until you get home. I've only washed them a couple times so far, but they seem to be really good quality and are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: keanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Swim Bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gym/pool bag. I purchased these for use in my swim bag. They are well made and easy to clean. I have had no issues with leaking when using them to hold a wet swimsuit. The compartment is large enough to fit a bath towel or several wet diapers. I hand wash these with my swimsuit using a detergent for delicates and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sagisi

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for wet swim suits
customer_reviews.text: This works so well to transport wet swimsuits. We ordered 1 for everyone in the family to use in their suitcases and gym bags.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: But these wet bags!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought wry bags 2x and they are my favorite! The patterns are cute, they don't leak ow smell, they're the perfect size, and they are the best price on Amazon. I currently use these for cloth diapers, but I've also used them for swim suits, packing different people's clothing into the same suitcase. They're the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: EmaebeTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good Size!!!
customer_reviews.text: So my order was for 3 and I got them for 3 places: my diaper bag, my husbands diaper bag, my pump parts. I was worried they would be too small initially, but after actually using them for my VAST multitude of pumping parts I realized its actually a perfect size! my newborn has blowouts and this works perfectly too, and best part they have different designs so I don't mix them up! I do wish the zippers felt a bit more sturdy, but they have held up fine for now!
customer_reviews.author: Raemysterio

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I carry 2 of these with me, each with a diaper and wipes. I can put the fresh diaper on baby, put the dirty diaper in the bag and be on my way. When I get home everything goes in the wash. These are also super helpful for we clothes, swimsuits after the pool, anything that gets poop on it as it seals it away until I can get home to clean it. No smell problems, no leaks, easy and travel friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For A Diaper Bage
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality bags that are extremely handy if you have a baby! I use one as a 'mini diaper bag' all the time. Diapers, wipes and a changing pad fits into the large part of the bag, and then you can put dirty diapers into the smaller waterproof pouch if you don't have immediate access to a trash bin. I've used these a lot over the last 4 months and had no tearing or leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kamath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great wet bag. I use one for cloth menstrual pads and the other one for wet swimsuits. They're large enough to store everything and I love the dividing zippers to keep the clean/dry ones in 1 compartment and the dirty/wet ones in the other compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Jane DIY

customer_reviews.title: Great for Workout Clothes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for traveling with smelly workout clothes. Over the past couple of months, they've worked wonderfully! They do need to be wiped down and aired out once you've emptied them (they retain a bit of the smell at first), but they do well to limit any smell seeping into other clothes, even when packed tightly into a suitcase. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great for pump parts!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I pump at work using an Elvie and I use one of these bags to store my pump parts in to travel back and forth. I also use one for bottles storage to travel to and from babysitter. They are pretty good at staying dry even if bottles are wet and I wash them once a week to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Inman

customer_reviews.title: Best Value, Best Quality; Love These Wet/Dry Bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the gym or everyday travel when you have to swap out clothes. Prior to this purchased I used Walmart bags to store my soiled gym clothes. This a durable, ive had them for a month with daily use and weekly washes. Wish I would've had these bags when my daughter was little. The have a big section and two smaller sections in each bag. Also have a nice little loop to hand on hooks.
customer_reviews.author: La Tisha Shantae'

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly convenient
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest products I’ve purchased for kids. Machine washable, durable, and holds a lot (I’ve put two adult bathing suit, two kids cover ups, two kids bathing suits, and two dresses in one). My only advice is try to ring clothes so they’re not actually dripping wet before putting them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good for most use cases I think. Personally, I planned on putting these in a backpack with wet swim gear in it. Wet swim gear that is directly next to pretty pricey tech. The problem with these bags is, when tested by pooring water into them, they leak pretty bad. I realize no one would ever do this, but I can’t take the chance they would leak in my bag. To be clear, it isn’t the fabric which leaks. As far as I can tell that is all, but entirely water proof. It’s the seems and and the zipper. For putting into a gym bag however, these will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a health care professional & wanted/needed something non-disposable to bring my dirty clothes home from work. I love these bags because they're the perfect size for my scrubs (with extra room) and I feel comfortable transporting my dirty clothes home in them from work. They're washable so you can either take your clothes out and wash together or wash your dirty clothes inside of the bags if you don't want to touch dirty scrubs! Zero waste!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump parts
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fantastic! I use them to store pump parts in the refrigerator at work and my lunch in the 2nd section. They don't take up a lot of space and are very cute. I work a 12hr shift and rinse my pump parts, then i place back in the bag. Towards the end of shift it does get a tad wet at the bottom. But it's not meant to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wuest

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and very useful
customer_reviews.text: These have been holding up well. When containing diaper waste they do not leak the smell at all. They wash clean easily and I hang them up to dry. Completely waterproof as far as I can tell. Super wet things inside have never escaped. They’re pretty, too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed and sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Great wetbag set for cloth diapering. I use these at the pool as well, though the water resistance isn’t as great as with a cloth diaper inside. I love the pocket on the outside, the strap with a snap and the cute patterns. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are sized to hold a couple composition notebooks, with the smaller pocket for pens and such. I was expecting much smaller, they won't work for my purposes. But a nice size for journaling, or you know, the actual intended purpose. :)
customer_reviews.author: t anderson

customer_reviews.title: Discolored after one wash
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use for my pump parts. After I use them I rinse them with hot water then put them into the fridge in the bag. Is the bag doesn’t really get too dirty. I just washed one for the first time and it’s now all discolored and looks terrible. They are not really washable and I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WhitneyM

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Exactly as expected. Although after using them for a few months, the snap for the loop has moved because of the weight. Eventually it will slide off the fabric and then we will not be able to hook it on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ninny82

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I had bought another brand before these, and ended up buying these because the other brand was not water resistant at all. These are incredible quality and even have 2 seperate pockets if you want to seperate the soiled items in the bag. I highly recommend these, especially for cloth diapering!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bags leak !!
customer_reviews.text: The lavender bag leaks horribly. I use it for my swimsuit after the gym Andy entire bag was soaking wet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality. I store my breast pump parts and milk bags in it between pump sessions. They are very water resistant and the front pocket keeps extra dry stuff. Also perfect to put soiled clothes on the big pocket and clean ones in front.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Swim Mom Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter’s swim bag as she is on a swim team and brings wet suits home several times a week. These wet bags have kept everything else in her swim bag dry and have adorable patterns. I’m very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for multi-use
customer_reviews.text: I use one for my breast pump arts and the others for diapers and feeding supplies. Great quality and value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi Gonz

customer_reviews.title: Great for sweaty gym clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my post gym clothes and absolutely no sweaty moisture or smell seeps through at all. They’re super easy to clean too. I just turn them inside out and throw em in the wash with my gym clothes and they come out good as new and ready to use again. Would recommend 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: K and Tay

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical when I ordered these. I want a wet bag to contain dirty diapers and soiled clothing that my son produces in abundance. I have wet bags from Grovia that I love, but those are expensive. These are the same TPU material for significantly less.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey WatsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I always stick one of these in the diaper bag as a wet bag (I cloth diaper and use cloth wipes as well). The prints are vibrant and beautiful! They are Easy to clean, I just throw it in with the diaper laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional, quality buy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price - the possibilities are endless! Used for storing wet breast pump parts, snacks, swimsuits, change of clothes, toys, books. The zipper and snap handle are sturdy and the patterns are cute!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: So useful for so many things
customer_reviews.text: I started using these for breast pump parts when going to work. I am a stickler for hygiene and was putting everything in Ziploc bags but that was so wasteful every day! These are perfect and when I don't need them for that anymore I can repurpose them any number of ways!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has a separate pocket for wipes
customer_reviews.text: So handy. Not only super cute, vibrant patterns but also has two zippered pockets. The smaller pocket works great for us, as we put diaper liners there rather than leaving them in the diaper where they might get forgotten and washed. We have four now, and I'd like a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: YV

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby’s diaper bag and it’s very useful for tossing dirty clothing in when we’re not home. If she spit up on something I can toss it in here. Also a hat if hers fell on the floor of the pediatrician’s office and I was scared of germs or mixing it up withbher other clothing, so I zipped it in here! :) Once home you can toss this bag in the laundry too :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny :)

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's preschool change of clothes in case he has an accident. I love the bright color and how it fits two changes of clothes perfectly all the while fitting in his toddler sized backpack. The zipper seems to be of good strength. I'm not able to comment on how well it keeps wet in the wet side and dry in the dry, since he hasn't had an accident since I purchased. From the way it looks, I think it would do just fine. I will update once I can!
customer_reviews.author: OPalfreyman

customer_reviews.title: Very practical bags but can leak of there is too much liquid.
customer_reviews.text: I do use these all the time for dirty baby bottles but I hate that the leftover milk(maybe just 2ml.) seeps through the bottom corner of the bag. Definitely come in use overall but that is my only complaint. Maybe I received a defective set of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: a plastic bag would do a better job
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay dry on the outside. So if you needed to put wet clothes or damp clothes or anything it’s not going to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing cloth diapers. I don’t put soaking wet items in here, but I do put my dirty diapers in here & it can hold up to 6 pocket diapers at a time. I like the extra pocket as well. The size is great and so is the material. I like that you get three so when one is in the wash, you can rotate. Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: amia

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately didn't work for me. I buyed for my after swimming soaky swimsuit and my sport bag ended all soaky too! :(
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great!! use for the beach, pool, camp.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great, the size is perfect for our use. My daughter uses for camp or the pool. It fits a (thinner) kids beach towel, bathing suit and there is even a separate pocket for goggles. They dry quickly, don't smell mildewy, and the patterns are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: chrissybklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These bags hold a lot for their size. I put my son’s Suit ( shirt and trunks) plus his towel in the bag. I put the wet back in the main bag and the bag doesn’t leak. Everything in the main bag stays dry. Great purchase! They will be perfect for pool days this summer
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: We use these daily for soiled cloth diapers and wet clothes from daycare. They wash well on cold cycle and air dry. The zippers ate plastic and pop open so lower score for that issue.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Well made bags!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bags for the price! Very well made, very happy that they hold in liquids and smells quite well. Mostly using for reusable diapers and dirty onesies but will also use for bathing suits in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the wet in - not out
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months - I use them for wet bathing suits and they haven't leaked or spread wet once - I love them :) (I do wash them in the washer but I do not put in the dryer)
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It's super cute and the stitching and zipper looked in tact
customer_reviews.text: the only reason I didn't give five stars is because I can't speak about performance. A cousin had this on her registry and I ordered it from there. It's super cute and the stitching and zipper looked in tact. The item matches the listings description and arrived within the expected time frame. Baby isn't here yet to say whether the bag holds up to it's promises or not though.
customer_reviews.author: Glamma Jacx

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price! Unexpected. I bought these as a cheap option to go in my diaper bag because wet/dry bags at baby stores are so expensive. I expected these to be thin and loud material but they are very nice! Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Marah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. As described!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my breast pump supplies. These bags work great. I am so happy I purchased. They look exactly like the photos, and they are a decent size to hold what you need. Great price for these 3 bags. I don't know how I managed without them!
customer_reviews.author: TNashawn

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! I purchased one for my toddlers daycare when he has accidents and one for my gym bag. They're quite large and fit my gym clothes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yazzzyy

customer_reviews.title: Great wet bags!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wet bags! I gave one to my sister and keep two in rotation at home. We use old cloths for baby wipes and these are great to store them in between washes. They wash up great! The small front pocket is for dry items and the larger back pocket is for wet. I love that these are not patterned and are great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant, good size
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags for cloth diapers! They are a good size: they fit well in my diaper bag and hold 4-5 diapers without them being too crammed. They hold pee and poop well, no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Spacious & Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Use these for my gym and dance bags, work great at distinguishing clean and dirty clothes. Overall enough space for several items and would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I use one for breast pump parts (so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use one for breast pump parts (so things don't have to be totally dry before I go anywhere), and one stays in the daycare bag for clothes where baby has blowouts. Great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to keep worn undergarments while on vacation.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these to use as a laundry bag on a trip, along with another brand that was a larger size. I think this size will be great for undergarments and soiled shirts, and I like the front zippered compartment in case I want to separate items for whatever reason. Both products did equally well repelling water, so I don't think there will be an issue with sweaty/soiled clothes dirtying up the clean clothes.
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Cali

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim suits.
customer_reviews.text: I use them for my swim suit and they work well for that. My wet bathing suit usually isn't left in the bag for more than 2-3 hours . I did find that when I forgot and left my suit in the bag overnight, water was beginning to seep at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Ohiosue

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my breast pumping supplies to keep in the fridge. These work great and are a much better value than the ones designed for the supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I use after my sons swim lessons and at beach. I try to get as much water out of swim suits and swim diapers before putting in. So far they have not leaked. They are large, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very practical.
customer_reviews.text: We use these bags for storing dirty clothes diapers if we’re out of the house, and for a little “emergency diaper bag” that I leave in my car with necessities. I like that it has two compartments. They work really well for what I need; of the three I’ve only had one leak a little bit so that’s the one I just use as a bag in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: A diaper bag must have!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for holding soiled baby clothes while we’re out and about. I keep them in our diaper bag and car in case my son has a poop explosion or wets his clothes. They are good at keeping the smells in and are very water resistant. They wash well too. I plan to switch my son to cloth diapers before potty training and will be using these bags to hold his soiled diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam’s mama

customer_reviews.title: Larger then most
customer_reviews.text: These are larger then other bags I have gotten on amazon! I use these for everything !! Cloth diapers Dirty clothes on the go Swim suits Ect Ect
customer_reviews.author: ozelanik

customer_reviews.title: Great little day bag
customer_reviews.text: Deeper pink than my computer showed, but I love the woodland pattern. Will fit about 6 bumgenius all in one diapers which is a day at daycare. They roll the used diapers up nice & tight to contain the inside mess and this helps keep the moisture from coating the inside of the bag as well. Maybe 8 diapers if you stuff them in well. Also left at daycare for wet clothes to be sent home in. I imagine they will be used for other things as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Quill

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to separate my little ones swim items in one bag. Large enough to hold a set of clothes and their swim clothes, along with a thin microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Good wet bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made durable wet bag. I’ve bought several and they’ve held up very well being used for a variety of things. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: If you travel and have wet items like swim suits that you need to pack then you need these. These have come in handy during my recent travels. They didn’t allow my wet items to mingle with my dry ones.
customer_reviews.author: Karwyn

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for baby’s dirty clothes, spit up bibs, even trash you don’t have access to a trash can to throw away quickly! I love that these can be washed also! Super light weight & don’t take too much room!
customer_reviews.author: AJ & Emily Nawabi

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These have been great and have washed well so far. They are a good size too. I use them for my breast pump parts in the fridge as of now. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: wcugrad09

customer_reviews.title: Squee so cute and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am a soon to be mother of two, a toddler and a newborn. I saw this hack on YouTube about using bags such as these to help keep kiddos items separate and organized while traveling. I figured it would be a great way to help keep the diaper bag tidy too! Excellent quality, nice size, and my toddler got to pick the print they wanted so that they feel special. :)
customer_reviews.author: K Salmon

customer_reviews.title: They ok
customer_reviews.text: They are nice for travel. I got them originally so that I could put my cloth dippers in them. However, when I received the package the bags was way to small. So I used them for a travel bag when my daughter mess up her clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Zakiya

customer_reviews.title: Wet bags!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love wet bags for everything - for the gym, for a change of clothes for my son, for extra shoes. Literally anything and everything. Hopefully these ones are just as good as my others !
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Great and convenient, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and have been using it for my bathing suit! Haven't put soaked items in it, so not sure exactly how waterproof it is.
customer_reviews.author: JCE

customer_reviews.title: Well made roomy bags...would buy again! Totally mom approved!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 kids and use these all.the.time! Will probably get more so hubby and I can have our own as our kids love to have their own. They are very roomy and we use them to store all kinds of things versus just wet stuff. Totally come in handy this summer at beach and pool and they’re well made and totally does what it’s supposed to! Mom approved!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a cruise
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a cruise because I didn't want to have to walk around on our day trips with a wet bathing suite. These thing were the best things. Easy to carry and worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Shorts

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. they hold my dirty gym clothes and my towel, wash cloth well. durable and the colours are really nice. will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use. The zipper broke on one of them within a month of use but I have had the other two for 6 months now and they’re still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L

customer_reviews.title: Great little bags to store wet items
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and cute. I got these bags for my diaper bag to hold items that get soiled. Did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling with wet swim suits
customer_reviews.text: Got them for travel with wet bathing suits. Does exactly what I needed. Keeps the wet items away from my dry stuff in suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect swim wet bag. I use this for my sons swim lessons and visits to the pool and it’s perfect and better quality than I even expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ali K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love the different colors. Bright and stylish. Use these to put extra bottle parts for my diaper bag and to store dirty baby clothes. Works so far. Washed inside out in the washer with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Chen

customer_reviews.title: Quality wet bags for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have used daily for over a year and still going strong where other bands have frayed or broken zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Front pocket is awesome
customer_reviews.text: These wet bags seem to be good so far. I love double zipper bags so you can keep multiple things in side. I use one pocket for dirty diapers and the other pocket for clothes. I also bought these bags specifically for my daughter to take to preschool so I wasn't using zip top bags everytime they needed to change her clothes. Highly recommend even for beach or pool days
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Cook

customer_reviews.title: Other uses
customer_reviews.text: Enlisted military, bought these bags to help carry books and other supplies during field problems inside backpacks/assault packs. They work great for this purpose, so I suppose they would be great for normal diaper bags!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Olmos

customer_reviews.title: Cute but only practical for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I use these for cloth diapers but one bag only holds about 3-4 diapers with their inserts. These bags are very cute and leak proof however I only use them for traveling now because they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great wet bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these wet bags, especially for the price. They can hold diapers or wet wipes/rags for several days without any leaks. Easy to wash and I hang dry them. I really like that the strap can be unbuttoned to loop through a changing table, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: They’re OK
customer_reviews.text: They’re pretty. Leak pretty fast/ easily though. They’re inexpensive though so I didn’t expect them to be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in my gym bag to stick my sweaty clothes in after I shower. Keeps my gym bag from getting stinky!
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom206

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I have a special needs son and this are great for caring around extra clothes “just in case”
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Bright colorful pattern
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use these, so I can't speak to how they perform as a dry bag...but they are adorable and seem to be made from high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Super handy when on the go! I never knew these existed but are a life saver. Also going to be one of my top gifts to give.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Peterson

product_meta.title: Babygoal Wet Dry Bags for Baby Cloth Diapers, Washable Travel Bags, Beach, Pool, Gym Bag for Swimsuits & Wet Clothes with 2 Pockets 3 Pack L-BWG
feature_bullets: A truly wonderful bag that allows you to carry your wet and dry items in the same bag.
Each bag contains a "wet" section that is sewn and sealed for no wicking or leaking AND a zippered dry section for keeping dry diapers or inserts.
Size: 30cm x 36cm and holds approx 5-7 cloth diapers. Comes with a handle so that you can easily pick the bag up or hang it.
Machine washable,reusable and waterproof. Very light, less than 50g.
Comes with TWO zip closures to ensure that nothing will drop out of the bag and keep the clean and dirty diapers separately.

specifications.Material free: BPA Free, Latex Free, Lead Free, Phthalate Free
specifications.Care instructions: Clean after Use, Hand Washable, Machine Washable, Keep in a Dry Place
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,163 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
